meanings.definition: A person or thing that reaches.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was one of the best reachers in her class, always getting things from high shelves for her friends.
meanings.sent2: The reachers in the basketball team helped them win the game by scoring the most points.
meanings.sent3: The reachers in the race were the first to cross the finish line, surprising everyone with their speed.
meanings.sent4: The reachers in the forest were the tall trees that seemed to touch the sky.
meanings.sent5: The reachers in the painting were the outstretched arms of the figure, symbolizing hope and connection.

meanings.definition: A tool with a long handle used for grasping or picking up objects out of reach.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa used his favorite reachers to grab the book from the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: The janitor used reachers to pick up litter from the schoolyard.
meanings.sent3: The reachers in the garage were always handy for reaching items on high shelves.
meanings.sent4: The reachers in the garden were like an extra pair of hands for the busy gardener.
meanings.sent5: The reachers in the store helped customers grab items from the back of the shelf easily.
